id.description: Unique identifier for the created task. Must be >= 0.

statusCounts.description: Map of task statuses and their counts.

history.description:
List of task history entries. Minimum of 1 entry ensures that some history is always returned.
Maximum of 1000 entries prevents excessive data transfer and processing for very long-running tasks.

v1HeartbeatResponse.description:
Response message for the heartbeat request.
 Currently, this message is empty, indicating successful receipt of the heartbeat.
v1HeartbeatResponse.title: Message for heartbeat response

parameters.description:
Dynamic key-value pairs for task parameters. 
Keys must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, or dashes. 
Values are limited to 1024 characters to prevent excessive data storage.

work.description:
Work assignment to be executed.

The task to be executed.

id.description: Unique identifier for the task. Must be >= 0.

name.description:
Name of the task. Must be alphanumeric, underscores, or dashes, 
with a maximum length of 255 characters.

type.description: Type of the task, must be either SEND_EMAIL or RUN_QUERY.

status.description: Current status of the task, must be one of the defined statuses.

retries.description:
Number of retries attempted for this task. Limited to 10 to prevent
infinite retry loops while allowing for reasonable error recovery.

priority.description:
Priority level of the task. Higher values indicate higher priority.
Must be non-negative to ensure valid prioritization.

createdAt.description:
Timestamp of when the task was created, in ISO 8601 format (UTC).
This format ensures consistent time representation across different systems.

payload.description: Payload containing task parameters. This field is required.

description.description: Description of the task. A large text string with a maximum length of 5000 characters.

dependencies.description: IDs of tasks that must complete before this task.

baseImage.description: Base image for the task execution environment.

env.description: Environment variables for the task execution.

id.description: Unique identifier for the history entry. Must be >= 0.

status.description: Status of the task at the time of this history entry.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when this history entry was created, in ISO 8601 format.

details.description:
Additional details about the task's execution or status. 
Maximum length of 2000 characters.

tasks.description: List of tasks in the system.

v1TaskStatusEnum.description:
- QUEUED: Task is in the queue, waiting to be processed
 - RUNNING: Task is currently being executed
 - FAILED: Task encountered an error and failed to complete
 - SUCCEEDED: Task completed successfully
 - UNKNOWN: Task status cannot be determined
 - ALL: Represents all task statuses
v1TaskStatusEnum.title: Enum for Task statuses
